**I want** [large goal/capability]
**So that** [business value/benefit]

- [ ] Criterion 3

## Epic Management Tips

**GitHub Projects Integration:**
- Assign this epic to a milestone (e.g., v1.0.0)
- Set Target Date in project custom field
- Use Priority field to indicate importance
- Track in Roadmap view for timeline visualization

**Progress Tracking:**
- GitHub automatically shows progress based on sub-issues
- Use project board to track sub-issues through workflow
- Update epic description as scope/plans evolve

**Best Practices:**
- Keep epics focused (should complete in 1-3 months)
- Break into 5-10 user stories max
- Each user story should be completable in 1 sprint
- Review and refine epic regularly with team
